live_updates: This issue has been resolved. Thank you for your patience.

62892.summary: Some customers in the Fort Richmond area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
62892.title: June 20 - Winnipeg (Fort Richmond) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.

62889.title: June 20 - Thunder Bay (Westfort) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
